O

OrchestratedTest - Class in nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing
This carries out the actual testing of the orchestrated specification specification - ensuring ordering of the received exchanges is as expected

This will be extended for actual tests and will use JUnit Parameterized to add parameters at runtime.

OrchestratedTestSpecification - Class in nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.specification

XmlTestResource - Class in nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.resource
